deck:
The shredded remains of of one of the estimated seven trillion dwarf galaxies
in the observable Universe has been located buried within our Milky Way
Galaxy. Some astronomers think that the largest globular cluster in the Milky
Way, Omega Centauri,...
headline: Weekend Image: "The Aquarius Stream" --Remnant of a Dwarf Galaxy Devoured by the Milky Way (TheDailyGalaxyNewsFromPlanetEarthBeyond?format=xml)
